text: It's a lot more work but the obvious alternative to having fast automerge so a sequence of dependent registrations can happen in a timely manner is to make it possible for all of those registrations to go together.

elements.text: It's a lot more work but the obvious alternative to having fast automerge so a sequence of dependent registrations can happen in a timely manner is to make it possible for all of those registrations to go together.

text:
I agree we want that, though I think we want both in the long-term.

As you say, it’s a lot more work, and we need to actually solve this pretty soon as it is starting to become a real problem (the example I gave of being stuck waiting at end of the day is not one I made up, that actually happened to me before Christmas).
